Adventure Guildsman:
You can hear about all kinds of adventures at the Adventure Guild.
An adventure can be something as trivial as delivering a letter or playing matchmaker, or be as grand as joining an expedition to fight Earth Dragon Antharas!
I can also help you exchange your Adventurer's Marks and Seals.
Now tell me, what is your desire?
